quote_first: “I expect she didn’t want Octavia to know that she’d called in her father, not until they’d worked out a plan. And I was the one who fixed the time. I didn’t see how I could catch a train before the seventeen-twenty-two which gets in to Waterloo at
title: A Certain Justice
author: P.D. James

quote_first:
Everybody turns in his chair and watches that butter sneak on down the wall, starting, hanging still, shooting ahead and leaving a shiny trail behind it on the pain. Nobody says a word. They look at the butter, then at the clock, then back at the butter. The clock’s moving now.
The butter makes it down to the floor about a half
quote_last: , and McMurphy gets back all the money he lost.
title: One Flew Over the Cuckoo’s Nest
author: Ken Kesey
